23001.name: The Halls of the Enlightened
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x floor
allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet in
slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing the
room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23007.name: A Perplexing Staircase
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x floor
allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet in
slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing the
room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23005.name: The Halls of the Enlightened
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x floor
allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet in
slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing the
room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23077.name: DCD Officer and Knight Lounge
description: "{^We are going to have to {!  Act{^: If we want to live in a Different
World.  {x" The Creed of the Dimensional Control Department hangs
proudly as part of a newspaper clipping from the Torregiano Times.
The room is warm and well-lit, and has many inviting chairs and sofas
for you to relax on.  The east lies the Girl's dorm, and the South
lies the Boy's barracks.

23006.name: A Perplexing Staircase
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x floor
allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet in
slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing the
room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23076.name: The DCD Datacore
description: The heart of the DCD HQ is saturated with input devices and
monitors.  There are even translucent, free-moving versions of
monitors circling around the centre pad.  The room is dizzying, and
you have to duck to avoid the screens-of-light.  Not that they could
hurt you....  Could they?

23010.name: The Halls of the Enlightened
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x
floor allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet
in slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing
the room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23056.name: {^The Forgotten City: {8Eclipse{x
description: Though sealed in a small, protected dome from the outside
atmosphere of Tranquility, Eclipse keeps it's dignity with it's few
reawakened residents trying to piece together their lives.  The
residents seem more rejoiceful, than surprised at their reawakening,
and have prophecized the return of the Conclave to it's rightful
place.  Outside the dome, the {5deep purple skies{x stretch over the
horizon

23074.name: DCD Intell Core: Gamma-Helix
description: This hall connects the lobby with the Recharging System.  It, like
the lobby, is also marked with many monitors with strange data
displayed.  It seems to be depeciting the trace-out of a young, female
form, while running diagnostic programs...

23000.name: The Heart of all Creation
description: The center of the universe, the point where all things begin an end.
The exact place in which the Citadel is Built {8Black Marble{x floors
with {&O{8p{&a{8l{x columns line the huge hall.  Looking outside the crystal
window, the endless singularity of All Creation sheds it's
{1mu{!lt{#ic{@ol{Bor{5ed {xlights into the room, ambiently lighting what the {^Icy
{^Blue {xradiance from the auras misses.  A huge set of stairs sprials to
the second floor, and down leads to the {8Dark {xCrystal stairway.

23004.name: The Halls of the Enlightened
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x floor
allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet in
slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing the
room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23003.name: The Singularity
description: The Singularity is raw here.  It's energy flowing uncontrollably and
unharnessed.  Sounds and images from across time saturate your senses,
making it difficult for all but the most enlightened ones to pass.

23032.name: {!The Transcedent Path{x
description: Walking along a crystal-clear bridge of hewn Quartz, the world
seems to spiral into infinty bounds beyond.  Reality's very fabric
seems to crumble into unspeakable parts and counterparts, shifting
into a virtuoso space, saturating your senses with sounds and
sensations not meant for the mortal creations.  Beyond, there is a
glimpse, a simple realm of Perfection, Unity, and Oneness.
That vision is the place known as '{@The Garden{x'.  The true Center of all creation.

23033.name: {@The Silent Walks{x
description: The Walks circumnavigate the actual center gardens, flourshing
below.  The gardens are a lush, near-tropical barbican of dense
forest.  The walkway is a thin translucent substance, which is not
quite metal, not quite mineral, which circles to a point beyond:
A large city which seems to be a perfect balance of Technology and Nature.
The City the Conclave have sought after for ages.
The Homeworld.
'{^Tranquility.{x'

23070.name: {^Path to the {BJ{2ump{5-{BP{2oint{x
description: Inside the shielded tunnel of glass lies many security checkpoints.
Conclave Securitron Devices line the walls, and beams of {!  Red{7 and
{^blue{7 lights constantly move about the tube.  The glass tube is
reinforced with plates of steel which are embedded with devices which
emit diffused light.  The tube is partioned in the middle, and through
the glass, you can see the destination: A large open-air metallic
platform with a column of {^s{7h{^i{7m{^m{7e{^r{7i{^n{7g{7 li{#g{7ht{x.

23071.name: {*Second Section
description: The second half of the tunnel has a translucent security screen to
ensure only the worthy access the Jump-Point The circular partition
seems to be able to divide up into three seperate peices, each made to
slide out of the path.

23011.name: The Halls of the Enlightened
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x floor
allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet in
slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing the
room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23072.name: {^Gate to T{6en{2h{@a{2u{6se{^r{x
description: The shining metallic floor reflects the bright lights from the
centre gate.  There are at least a half dozen workers here attending
multiple control panels around the platform.  The floor is marked with
large {!  Red{7 arrows and designs supposedly meaning something.

23069.name: DCD Regeneration System
description: The walls take a different texture upon getting to the lift system.
The walls become smoother, and lack the large amount of screens and
keys.  There is a constant humming noise...  Almost like harmonic
vibration coming from above.

23064.name: {^The Forgotten City: {8Eclipse{x
description: Though sealed in a small, protected dome from the outside
atmosphere of Tranquility, Eclipse keeps it's dignity with it's few
reawakened residents trying to piece together their lives.  The
residents seem more rejoiceful, than surprised at their reawakening,
and have prophecized the return of the Conclave to it's rightful
place.  Outside the dome, the {5deep purple skies{x stretch over the
horizon.

23002.name: A Black Crystal Stariway
description: The long, {8{7da{8rk{7ly{x {7{&c{7lea{&r{x{x stairway descends into the endless {8void{x below.
Swirling hues of {%pu{5rp{%le{x, {8black{x, {Bb{blu{Be{x, and {7grey{x fly freely about as
you walk down into nothingness.  Nothing stands between you and a
possibility endless fall, no rail guards your {@l{2if{@e{x from an eternal
plunge.  The gates to the world are below...  And two portals lead to
the outfitter and the meditation room.
Several stable rips in reality are here, serving as portals for the
Conclave Seers.
West- The Cavern of the Tarrasque
South- Zozo: Sixth Floor
East- Anarchist Brewery

23068.name: DCD Intell Core: Lobby
description: Well polished steel floors refract hints of vectored lights.  The
place is wall to wall technology, with lights and screens showing
massive amounts of incalculable data.  The DCD emblem is on a few of
the screens, protecting the imaging system from static burn.

23075.name: DCD Intell Core: Gamma-Helix
description: This hall connects the lobby with the Recharging System.  It, like
the lobby, is also marked with many monitors with strange data
displayed.  It seems to be depeciting the trace-out of a young, female
form, while running diagnostic programs...

23031.name: Everywhere and Nowhere at Once
description: Everywhere and nowhere at once.  What is there to say?  It is all,
and it is none.  Need we say more?

23012.name: The Halls of the Enlightened
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x floor
allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet in
slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing the
room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23028.name: The Conclave Magic Shop
description: The magic shop has changed since the last time you saw it...  The
once cluttered confusion has given way to a vast orderly collection of
powerful magical concoctions.  Asina, the New Conclave Weaver has
taken precidence over her mother, Nalla.  Asina sits there, her tail
in a slight coil as she smiles at your gaze.

23078.name: DCD Girl's Dorm
description: The Girl's dorm is clean from one corner to the other.  Ready for
use by any DCD officer that might need it.  The room isn't as plain as
the Men's dorm, but that's mostly caused by the open windows.

23030.name: The Conclave Outfitter
description: The walls are lined with various implements of protection and
destruction.  There is a broad shouldered man inspecting the merchandise.
He seems rather pleased at today's results.

23009.name: The Halls of the Enlightened
description: Floating in the midst of the True Frontier, The clear, {%pu{5rp{%le{x floor
allows your gaze to go past it, into the void of space.  A comet in
slow orbit emits gentle lights from it chemical reactions bathing the
room in a {@Gr{2e{@en {xglow.

23055.name: {^The Forgotten City: {8Eclipse{x
description: Though sealed in a small, protected dome from the outside
atmosphere of Tranquility, Eclipse keeps it's dignity with it's few
reawakened residents trying to piece together their lives.  The
residents seem more rejoiceful, than surprised at their reawakening,
and have prophecized the return of the Conclave to it's rightful
place.  Outside the dome, the {5deep purple skies{x stretch over the
horizon.

23024.name: Rips in the Sigularity
description: Several stable rips in reality are here, serving as portals for the
Conclave Seers.
North- Market Square
East- Museum of Creatures
West- The Adept of Lathader, At the Fanatic's Tower.

23008.name: An IxLab Head Scientist~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M act 23010 ready for transport~
M random 23012 2~
23008.room_name: A figure in a labcoat is here overseeing the team.

23009.name: Nynia~
description:
Nynia Aoi-Carpentier is the worst thing that ever happened to cheaters.
Nynia Aoi-Carpentier isn't anyone you wanna mess with.
Nynia Aoi-Carpentier does not make a mercyful enemy.
Nynia Aoi-Carpentier loves to crush people who cause shit on WD.
Nynia Aoi-Carpentier would LIKE to be your friend, but that might not happen.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M act 23014 arrive~

23010.name: Pierre, Guard of {#DOOM.{x~
description:
Attack him,  go ahead... I DARE you... 
Don't go crying to the imms though...
subroutines:
F for A
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M random 23013 5~
M grall 23013 100~
23010.room_name: A REALLY small Conclave guard, one may even call him: Midget.

23011.name: (no short description)~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

23042.name: (no short description)~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

23028.name: Asina Yumo~
description:
Nalla's child, Asina, is much like her mother.  Her long, powerful
tail stretches over a dozen feet, and looks strong enough to crush
three men simultaneously.  Short blue hair and pupilless pink eyes are
phazed just a little behind wire framed glasses.  Her body is slightly
overproportioned, however subtracts nothing from her charm.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M random 23003 3~
M grall 23002 85~

23029.name: Renix~
description:
Long light brown hair is tied back with a simple ring, a calm demeanour
drapes a fine molded face.  Dressed in fine blue robes, adorned with the
symbols of life and healing, he is here to tend your wounds.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 23004 purify me~
23029.room_name: A handsome man is here, chanting in soft tones.

23030.name: Keiro, armorer of the Conclave~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
23030.room_name: Keiro, the Conclave armorer, is here testing the wares.

23031.name: Lain~
description:
{1Semmingly emotionless and uncaring, {*Lain{1 has ascended to the
position of guard between reality and the {6Link.  {1 Having become
ageless from the long walk along the lines of death, she has learned
that death has no power over her any longer.  {1Forever caught at the
prime age of 14, she turns her focus into devotion of the Conclave
values.  {x
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M exall 23006 4~

23000.name: Ashanti~
description:
{^Eyes dark and distant as the {&Void {^itself, Ashanti represents one of
the acolytes in training of the Conclave.  Dedicated to guarding the
entrance, Ashanti has been granted many powers by Kathryn to fullfill
her duties.  
{x
subroutines:
M act 23000 appears in the room~
M grall 23000 100~
23000.room_name: Ashanti, Acolyte of Void, and Conclave Messanger.

23001.name: {%N{^e{6mu{^r{%a{x~
description:
With a strange but mezmerizing grace, this lady moves about,
tending to the construction of the formless boundraies of the Citadel.
She seems to be draconian, due to her iridescant wings of dragonkind
nature, but her skin has a smooth, delicate appearance.  Her eyes are
strange.  The iris of each eye is colored in ever changing {-c{-o{-l{-o{-r{-s{x.  A
very beautiful woman indeed, but you get the strangest sensation that
it wouldn't be a good idea to...  'try' anything.
subroutines:
F for AH
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
23001.room_name: With purple skin and translucent wings, {%N{^e{6mu{^r{%a{x stands here.

23002.name: {@Con{2cl{@ave {!Sec{3ur{!ity{x~
description: {1It's simple, really, a small crystal that scans the identity of each passer.  I'd hate to see what happens to intruders...you?{x
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 23005 100~

23003.name: Conclave-Tenhauser Security System~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M act 23001 access first partition~
M grall 23007 100~
23003.room_name: Beams of light shine through the Tube.

23004.name: Conclave Partition~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
23004.room_name: A large steel door divides the connector tube.

23005.name: Securitron Special Issue~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M act 23008 access second partition~
23005.room_name: A translucent screen of {@bright green light{7.

23006.name: Ixlab Scientest~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M random 23011 3~
23006.room_name: A tall human Scientist is here calculating a quantum theory.

23007.name: The Jump Point Energy Column~
description:
The Jump-Point is a miracle of transport, allowing a person to
travel all the way to the Tenhauser Gate within the blink of an eye. 
It's made of some sort of substantial energy, and is luminous.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
23007.room_name: A Column of {^b{&r{^i{&l{^l{&i{^a{&n{^t{7 light is in the centre of the floor.
